resources.string:
Thank you for using our FacilityShopping app. When buying at FacilityShopping you can be assured of the application's privacy policy. First Sign up for a new account, then log into the application, please select Go to the menu bar on the left side of the screen, select Profile and add more information with 2 security questions. When you forget your password, there are 2 ways to recover it. 
Method 1: Go to the "Forgot your password?" At the login screen, select Use security question to reset your password, then enter your phone number and 2 security questions has been set to regenerate a new password. 
Method 2: Go to the "Forgot your password?" At the login screen, select Use Email to retrieve your password


If you have any questions about our products, please contact us via phone number: 0843561561 or address email: fltshop@gmail.com
